bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: John N. Warfield was educated in mathematics and electrical engineering. He worked in eight universities and in three industries. Early on, he concentrated on teaching but later focused his energies on research. His publications include books on computers and complexity reflecting his development of systems science, incorporating a system for managing complexity. Understanding complexity, Warfield discovered, depended on a theory of thought about thought merged with empirical evidence of human behavioral pathologies and the application of design concepts in groups. Warfield's scientific research emphasized adherence to established criteria for scientific work, drawing inspiration from numerous well-known scholars, most especially Charles S. Peirce. Other scholars adopted his theories and methodologies, applying his research results in many locations and on many projects, invariably involving complexity. Their work provided ample and significant empirical evidence to support hypotheses and theories developed through his scientific endeavors, verifying the theoretical foundations of his scientific investigation. He also applied the results of his research to all levels of education with special attention paid to the shortcomings of higher education and requirements for adapting it to modern necessities.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The John N. Warfield Collection contains materials from Dr. Warfield's long and distinguished career, including papers authored and co-authored by Warfield, presentations, video and audio tapes, and correspondence. The date span of the materials is from 1946 to 2007.
List of Acronyms in the John N. Warfield Collection
AAAS - American Association for the Advancement of Science
AIIM - American Institute for Interactive Management
APT - Analytical Power Train (Ford Motor Company)
C3P - Computer Aided Design, Computer Aided Manufacturing, Computer Aided Engineering, Product Information Management
CIMI - Centre for Interactive Management India
IASIS - Institute for Advanced Study in Integrative Sciences
ISSS - International Society for Systems Science
ITESM - Instituto Technologico y de Estudios Superiores de Monterrey
NCMS - National Centre for Manufacturing Services
ORSA - Operations Research Society of America
SGSR - Society for General Systems Research
TIPP - The Institute of Public Policy

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged by subject/topic. Boxes of material with like content generally are grouped together, though some similar materials may be found in different locations. Please attach the following terms to your search in order to speed location of materials: VIDEO or VHS - for video recordings, IM REPORT - for interactive management reports, SITUATION ROOM - for such related materials, AUDIO - for audio recordings, TRANSPARENCIES - for graphics and teaching slides, PEIRCE - for C. S. Peirce related items. . Books have been cataloged separately and can be identified in the library's online catalog [http://magik.gmu.edu] by doing a keyword search on the name John Warfield.
